Sightseeing in Cimiez Area of Nice, 27 April 2003


---Amphitheater in the background, but it was hard to see because of the fence. The original amphitheater was wood and seated 500-600, It was rebuilt in 193-217 AD for a capacity of 5000. Vaulted entrances were separate for officers and enlisted men.---
---Part of the upper wall of the amphitheater.---
---We strolled in the park looking for a place to eat lunch.

---People were enjoying the oudoors.---
---We found a delightful sandwich stand.---
---My- food again!---
